exceptions.exn: The reference t_ind was not found in the current environment.

original: revert v. induction n using t_ind. - intros v H. inversion H. - intros v H. destruct (vec_sum_is_zero n v) eqn:Heq. { apply vec_sum_is_zero in Heq. subst v. simpl in H. lia. } pose proof (Fin.of_nat_lt n (vec_sum v - 1)); clear H. destruct (pos_S_inv p). ++ subst. exists Fin.F1.
